section_full_path: Sign up > New Onboarding > Active Locations
title: Verify Pro is able to complete onboarding flow with resume and positions selected in English

custom_steps_separated.content:
Launch app and tap "Create account" -> Enter "first name", "last name", phone number", and/or "Email address" -> Tap "Next"

- Email address is optional
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Error messages if 
- no inputs for name or phone number
- invalid phone number
- invalid email address


 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/pqr12345-6666-7777-8888-999999999901) ![](index.php?/attachments/get/pqr12345-6666-7777-8888-999999999902)

Error message if 
- no input for verification code
- incorrect verification code

 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/pqr12345-6666-7777-8888-999999999903) ![](index.php?/attachments/get/pqr12345-6666-7777-8888-999999999904)

custom_steps_separated.content:
(if the app is newly installed) Pro should see the "Instawork would like to send you notification" pop-up model  -> Tap "Allow"

 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/pqr12345-6666-7777-8888-999999999905)

Pro should land on "Hey <Pro name>, let's add your profile photo" screen with "I'll do this later" link at the bottom -> proceed to add a photo
 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/pqr12345-6666-7777-8888-999999999906)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
With REQUIRE_PROFILE_IMAGE_UPLOAD enabled, photo is now mandatory during onboarding
"Next" button is only visible AFTER a photo was added.

 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/pqr12345-6666-7777-8888-999999999907)

custom_steps_separated.content:
Pro should land on "Let's add your date of birth" -> Enter a birthdate

 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/pqr12345-6666-7777-8888-999999999908)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
An error should display if 
- no birthdate was entered.
- birthdate entered is under 18

(Birthdate is now required to complete sign up)

 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/pqr12345-6666-7777-8888-999999999909) ![](index.php?/attachments/get/pqr12345-6666-7777-8888-999999999910)

custom_steps_separated.content:
Pro should land on "Where do you live?" -> Enter a location -> Tap "Next"

 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/pqr12345-6666-7777-8888-999999999911)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Error should display if no location was entered

 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/pqr12345-6666-7777-8888-999999999912) 


Pro should be able to see the corresponding map below the entered location

 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/pqr12345-6666-7777-8888-999999999913)

custom_steps_separated.content:
Pro should land on "You will have access to these entry-level positions" with the 6 entry-level positions: 
        - GL
        - Warehouse Associate - Entry Level
        - Event Setup and Takedown
        - Custodial
        - Counter Staff / Cashier
        - Concession / Stand Worker


Select a position and tap "Next" 

 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/pqr12345-6666-7777-8888-999999999914)

Pro should land on "Select the advanced positions you are interested in" with a list of skilled positions sorted by categories.

Select a position and tap "Next" 

 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/pqr12345-6666-7777-8888-999999999915)

Pro should land on "Create your Instawork profile to get access to shifts" followed by
- Import your resume
- Don't have a resume?


Tap"Import your resume"

 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/pqr12345-6666-7777-8888-999999999916)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Pro can proceed to upload a resume and tap "Save"

 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/pqr12345-6666-7777-8888-999999999917) ![](index.php?/attachments/get/pqr12345-6666-7777-8888-999999999918)

custom_steps_separated.content:
On "Review and save profile" screen, scroll to the bottom and tap "Save profile" 

 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/pqr12345-6666-7777-8888-999999999919)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Pro should be able to 
- upload another resume
- edit summary
- add / edit / delete work experience, education, certifications

custom_steps_separated.content:
Pro should land on "Screening call required" screen

 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/pqr12345-6666-7777-8888-999999999920)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
- Tap "Skip" will skip the screening call and be redirected to the "Contractor Service Agreement" screen

- Pro is able to tap on either "Spanish" or "English" to start screening call / coach call -> Start the call -> Pro should be redirected back to "Screening call required" screen with "Next" button

 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/pqr12345-6666-7777-8888-999999999921) ![](index.php?/attachments/get/pqr12345-6666-7777-8888-999999999922)

custom_steps_separated.content:
Pro should land on "Contractor Service Agreement" -> Scroll down to the bottom and tap "I agree and accept" 

 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/pqr12345-6666-7777-8888-999999999923)
custom_steps_separated.expected: The "I agree and accept" CTA is only enabled AFTER pro has scrolled to the bottom of the screen

custom_steps_separated.content:
Pro should land on "Congrats!" screen with "Book your first shift" CTA and a "Account created successfully" green toast on top 
-> Tap on either the "back <-" button or the "Book your first shift" CTA

 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/pqr12345-6666-7777-8888-999999999924)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
If  "Find people you may know on Instawork" screen is presented, tap <- to proceed to the "Open shifts" screen
* Expected result: "Find people you may know on Instawork" screen should be removed
* This will be improved along in this ticket: https://project-tracker.example.com/tasks/45678

 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/pqr12345-6666-7777-8888-999999999925) 



Pro should be redirected to "Open shifts" screen

 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/pqr12345-6666-7777-8888-999999999926)

AdminPortal:
- Check user profile object: account status should be "active"

Pro app
- resume should be uploaded with work experience, educations, certifications
- The 6 entry-level positions should be auto-approved 

 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/pqr12345-6666-7777-8888-999999999927)
